channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - June 24, 2022
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-june-24-2022) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! Between this week and last week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Against the Fae Queen_ * _Alas for the Awful Sea_ * _Fate of Umdaar_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Spirit of 77_ * _Stars in the Dark_ * _The Between_ * _Voidheart Symphony_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - June 24, 2022

item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! Between this week and last week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • Alas for the Awful Sea

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Calendar category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Calendar to play!
